## Reflection Questions 

<span style="font-size: 20px; font-weight: bold;">**Time: 12 minutes**</span> <br>
<span style="font-size: 20px; font-weight: bold;">**Led by: Alessandro Bonanno**</span>

Each note taker, please summarize themes from your group's discussion:

- What features of the dashboard did you find particularly useful or surprising? (*Group 1 starts*)
- What limitations or problems did you encounter while navigating the dashboard? (*Group 2 starts*)
- What features would you add to the dashboard? (*Group 3 starts*)

## Final Question

<span style="font-size: 20px; font-weight: bold;">**Time: 8 minutes**</span> <br>
<span style="font-size: 20px; font-weight: bold;">**Led by: Lauren Chenarides**</span>

- Would you use this tool in your own research? Why or why not? (*Free talk; Please also make use of the chat feature.*)
